projects.name: Docres
projects.description: An AI-powered document search and question-answering system that helps you instantly retrieve relevant information from your documents. Ideal for handling large datasets. Currently under active development.

projects.name: Portpilot
projects.description: A handy CLI tool that lets developers map local development ports to custom domains. Test your projects with real domain names locally—no extra server config needed! Works on Windows, macOS, and Linux.

projects.name: JobBoard
projects.description: A fully responsive job recruitment platform built with React and Vite. Employers can post jobs and manage applicants, while job seekers can apply directly—smooth experience on both desktop and mobile.

projects.name: AutoLoginLPU
projects.description: A Chrome extension that auto-fills and submits your login credentials on LPU portals like UMS and OAS. Saves time and removes the hassle of repetitive logins. Available on Chrome Web Store.

projects.name: REST API
projects.description: A basic RESTful API that supports full CRUD operations using GET, POST, PATCH, and DELETE. Great for backend practice and understanding how APIs interact with databases.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: My personal portfolio site showcasing my skills, projects, and contact info. Features animated backgrounds using Particle.js, smooth transitions, and a clean UI built with Bootstrap.
